word:
14-16 (Ephesians 6:12; see EGW on Revelation 5:11). Two Opposing Powers.-- Two great 
                                                                           983
opposing powers are revealed in the last great battle. On one side stands the Creator of heaven and earth. All on His side bear His signet. They are obedient to His commands. On the other side stands the prince of darkness, with those who have chosen apostasy and rebellion (RH May 7, 1901).
